Class AccountContactRelationTriggerHandler

public without sharing class AccountContactRelationTriggerHandler
extends TriggerHandler

AccountContactRelation trigger methods: Handles duplicated email notifications and multiple main contacts when setting email notifications.

References: AccountContactRelationTriggerHelper class.

Change History

06/26/2021 Initial version.
05/22/2022 Use trigger framework new methods.
11/18/2023 afterInsert(), afterDelete(): Updates the account's number of agents assigned.
06/16/2024 afterUpdate(): Updates the account's number of agents assigned.
